Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: '(Picks up the head of a guard) Its... central nervous system is still intact...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Even when the Punishing Virus is waning... I can still hack into mechanical parts...', 4: '1'}
{3: "A faint hint of scarlet red enters the guard's system chip..."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "It's likely the blueprint of the Golden Vortex's engines... I guess luck is still on my side...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "(Stares at the head) You... were patrolling the engines, weren't you...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "But! It could still be a trap... There's no way Nat would've made this kind of mistake...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "(The antigen attaching to his arm gradually increases) Even if it's a trap... I don't have many options, anyway...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Infect the engines... might be... the best way I can destroy the Golden Vortex right now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I can't let the golden antigen spread to other continents... The Ascendants' plan would be threatened...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I guess... I'll have to do that now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I guess... I'll have to try that now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Head toward my target... Remove all obstacles...', 4: '1'}
